arts.ttl: 'Really bad' Barça had eyes on Dortmund in UCL
arts.sum: Hansi Flick lamented another "really bad" performance as Barcelona were held to a 2-2 draw at Real Betis on Saturday, dropping points for the fourth time in five LaLiga games.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Borussia Mönchengladbach 1-1 Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach and Borussia Dortmund played out a 1-1 draw at Borussia Park on Saturday evening. Not a lot to write home about in the first half. Dortmund had the…

arts.ttl: Jamie Gittens' wonder strike cancelled out as Gladbach and Borussia Dortmund share spoils
arts.sum: Jamie Gittens scored another fine goal but it was not enough for Borussia Dortmund to claim a first Bundesliga away win this season in a 1-1 draw at Borussia Mönchengladbach. Jamie Gittens unleashes an unstoppable shot to give Dortmund the lead in the 65th minute.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Jamie Gittens Scores Again as Dortmund Draw Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Despite taking a second-half lead after a goal from Jamie Gittens, they could not get the game over the line, with Pascal Groß conceding a penalty and Borussia Mönchengladbach equalizing minutes later. The brilliant young Englishman scored yet another banger, but it wasn’t enough for BVB to win.

arts.ttl: Gladbach and Dortmund play out low-action draw
arts.sum: A more or less fair result, though there were controversial non-penalty calls, saw Borussia Dortmund and Borussia Mönchengladbach split the difference in the Bundesliga's Saturday evening "Top-Spiel".

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Match Thread: Dortmund Seek Away Win in Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Streaming: ESPN+ (USA), Sky GO UK, and Sky Go (Germany) Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments.

arts.ttl: Club World Cup 2025 full schedule and fixtures for Chelsea and Man City
arts.sum: The expanded version of the competition takes place in the United States next summer with Chelsea and Man City representing the Premier League

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund predicted XI v Borussia Mönchengladbach: Julian Brandt to return?
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund come into their Bundesliga game against Borussia Mönchengladbach with an almost full-strength squad for the first time this season. The only noticeable absentees are Karim Adeyemi and Waldemar…

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs. Borussia Dortmund preview: Two European hopefuls face off
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach host Borussia Dortmund at the Borussia-Park on Saturday evening with the aim of climbing back into the European spots after multiple years without European football.

arts.ttl: Comparing Edin Terzic’s and Nuri Şahin’s Performances as BVB Manager
arts.sum: We (Paul) pulled together this data to compare Nuri Şahin and Edin Terzic across their first twelve Bundesliga matches as Borussia Dortmund manager. A glance at the league table after twelve games shows that neither Edin Terzic nor Nuri Şahin were meeting expectations at this early stage in their tenure as Borussia Dortmund's head coach.
